tag_list: matt, pippen, matt-pippen, teen-media-productions, teen-podcasters-network, b5media, teen, entrepreneur, blogger, podcaster
overview:
Matt Pippen is a 18-year-old online media producer and an IT professional. For almost the past three years, Matt has been involved in the podcasting and blogging fields and has only recently journeyed into producing video content for both his vidcast and YouTube. He also extended his work into the journalism field in late 2007 with his venture into writing the iPhone 24Ã—7 blog for the global new media company - b5media.

Matt is currently the President/CEO of Teen Media Productions, the largest online teen production company in the world. Teen Media Productions has companies such as the Teen Podcasters Network, Teen Bloggers Network, and MacFocus Magazine under its label. These companies produce quality, teen-made new media content.

In addition to Teen Media Productions, he is an IT consultant for his own firm. With his firm, Matt consults many different scale companies that make anywhere from thousands of dollars per year to in upward of one million of dollars per year, and likewise, he consults with personal clients.
